commit.message:
Update collection button text to 'View Collection'

Changed button label from 'Shop Now' to 'View Collection' in both collections page and featured collections component for improved clarity. Also removed user authentication item from TODO.md.

Update user param handling and Nav user email type

Changed RouteParams to accept a Promise for params and updated PATCH handler to await params for user ID extraction. Also modified NavProps to allow user email to be null, improving type safety.

Remove product and variant stock fields, add batch cart API

Eliminates the 'stock' field from Product and ProductVariant models, updates related seed and API logic, and introduces a new /api/cart/batch endpoint for adding multiple items to the cart at once. Adds AddAllToCartButton component and updates inspiration set page to support batch cart addition. Cleans up related UI and API code to reflect the removal of stock and support for product variants in cart operations.

Refactor user status handling to use server-side user

Replaces the useUserStatus client hook with server-side user retrieval via getCurrentUser. Updates components and pages to accept user props and removes the useUserStatus hook. This change improves consistency and enables user-dependent rendering on the server.

Enforce approval for cart and orders, add user status hook

Shopping cart and orders API routes now require user approval. Added useUserStatus hook for client-side user status checks. Updated components and pages to use approval logic, removed price visibility checks from server components, and integrated sonner for notifications. Deleted obsolete documentation files.

Rename middleware.ts to proxy.ts and update export

Renamed the file from middleware.ts to proxy.ts and changed the exported function name from middleware to proxy for clarity and consistency.

Add account signup and pending approval flow

Introduces a new user signup page and a pending approval page, including a resend confirmation email feature with supporting API and component. Updates navigation to include sign up, refines cart visibility for authenticated users, and improves footer and inspiration set layouts. Removes related links from product detail page and updates icon set.

Add admin dashboard, user management, and auth integration

Introduces admin dashboard and user management pages with approval workflow. Adds API routes for admin user listing and approval/rejection, integrates NextAuth for authentication and session management, and updates navigation and product card components to reflect user roles and approval status. Also adds middleware for admin route protection and improves footer links.

Add ProductVariant model and update schema

Introduces a ProductVariant model to support product variants with price, stem length, count per bunch, and stock. Updates CartItem and OrderItem to reference product variants, modifies migration and schema files, and adds @radix-ui/react-select dependency for UI enhancements.

Add inspiration sets feature and hero background

Introduces a new 'FeaturedInInspirationSets' component to display related inspiration sets on the product detail page. Updates the Hero component to use a slate green flowers background image for improved aesthetics. Removes the stock status and back button from the product page. Updates the style guide with new color scheme values.

Remove FeaturedInspiration from homepage

The FeaturedInspiration component import and usage have been removed from the Home page. This streamlines the homepage content and may be part of a redesign or simplification effort.

Replace Twitter and Gallery icons with Rose icon

Removed Twitter icon and related link from Footer. Replaced Gallery icon with Rose icon for the Inspiration link in Nav and updated icon exports accordingly.

Update homepage hero text for clarity

Revised the hero section title and subtitle on the homepage to better communicate the business offering. Also added a new shop page filtering feature to the TODO list.

Add shop pages and refactor product card usage

Introduced new shop listing and product detail pages. Refactored product card UI into a reusable ProductCard component, updating collection and featured products to use it. Adjusted price visibility logic based on user authentication and approval status. Minor UI tweaks to inspiration page image aspect ratio.

Add description to Category model and collections pages

Introduces a 'description' field to the Category model in Prisma and updates related API, seed, and generated types. Adds new collections pages to display categories and their products, and updates UI components to use category descriptions. Also includes minor UI improvements for inspiration pages.
